data.detailedDescription:

Well, based on the numbers I’m counting up on their list of available channels, Tug Pass includes more than 2,000 videos/episodes scattered throughout their network of sites. That’s a fucking great number, but I’m skeptical that it’s worth two million. TugPass is charging pretty much exactly as much as the other guys for a regular membership. Thirty bucks gets you in for a month, just like it does everywhere else. Their 3- and 12-month plans break down to pretty respectable rates, with the latter dropping to just under eight bones a month.

One of the major selling points of the network, besides the massive volume of smut, is the fact that downloads are included with the basic price.
